findings.title: Merkle Root hash integrity
findings.description: The Merkle root hash included in the user_config.json file has no way to check its integrity across all Gate.io users, making it vulnerable to tampering depending on client IP or other parameters.

findings.title: Vulnerable and Outdated gnark Dependency
findings.description: The project uses an outdated version of gnark (v0.7.1) which has known security vulnerabilities and performance issues, it is recommended to update to the latest version v0.9.1.

findings.title: Vulnerabilities in dependencies
findings.description: Multiple vulnerabilities found in dependencies, including Improper Signature Verification, Denial of Service (DoS), NULL Pointer Dereference, and Authorization Bypass.

findings.title: Improper Signature Verification affecting golang.org/x/crypto/ssh package
findings.description: The golang.org/x/crypto/ssh package is vulnerable to improper signature verification.

findings.title: Denial of Service (DoS) affecting golang.org/x/net/html package
findings.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability was found in the golang.org/x/net/html package, potentially allowing an attacker to cause a denial-of-service attack.

findings.title: NULL Pointer Dereference affecting golang.org/x/net/html package
findings.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in the golang.org/x/net/html package.

findings.title: Authorization Bypass affecting github.com/emicklei/go-restful/v3 package
findings.description: Vulnerability in go-restful/v3 package allowing authorization bypass.

findings.title: Improper Input Validation affecting github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core package
findings.description: The go-ethereum/core package is vulnerable to improper input validation, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Insecure Randomness affecting github.com/satori/go.uuid package
findings.description: The go.uuid package is vulnerable to insecure randomness, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and potential security risks.
